_metadata.description: Municipal utility overrides - city-owned utilities not in federal databases
_metadata.source: Manual compilation from utility websites and APPA data

Austin.name: Austin Energy
Austin.note: Austin Energy for electric, Austin Water for water/wastewater

Houston.name: CenterPoint Energy
Houston.note: Deregulated market - CenterPoint delivers, customer chooses retail provider

Los Angeles.name: Los Angeles Department of Water and Power (LADWP)

Santa Clara.name: Silicon Valley Power
Santa Clara.note: City of Santa Clara municipal utility

Orlando.name: Orlando Utilities Commission (OUC)
Orlando.note: Also serves parts of Orange and Osceola counties

Columbus.name: Columbus Division of Power
Columbus.note: Serves select areas, not entire city

Mesa.name: Salt River Project (SRP)
Mesa.note: SRP serves much of Phoenix metro area

Austin.name: Texas Gas Service
Austin.note: ONE Gas company - serves Austin metro area

El Paso.name: Texas Gas Service
El Paso.note: ONE Gas company - serves El Paso area

Denton County CoServ.name: CoServ Gas
Denton County CoServ.note: CoServ provides both electric and gas in Denton County - Little Elm, Oak Point, Frisco, Flower Mound, Highland Village, Corinth, Lake Dallas, Hickory Creek, Argyle, Aubrey, Pilot Point, Sanger, Krum

North Richland Hills.name: City of North Richland Hills Water

Los Angeles.name: Los Angeles Department of Water and Power (LADWP)

San Diego.name: City of San Diego Public Utilities

Chicago.name: City of Chicago Department of Water Management
Chicago.note: One of largest water systems in US

Atlanta.name: City of Atlanta Department of Watershed Management

Marietta.name: Marietta Board of Lights and Water
